DOC.detailed_description: Background purpose : The Danish national board Health award fund two study test method use effective early detection heavy drinker . The study carry 12 Danish municipality 2008 . The study part 'Diet , Smoking , Alcohol Exercise ' nationwide health study Danish population . It take place 13 municipality 2007 2008 . The purpose study determine whether web-based ultra-brief intervention , consist personalize normative feedback standardize self-help material , effective lower self report alcohol use heavy drinker . Design : The experiment design randomize control trial , heavy drinker allocate either : A ) intervention group receive web-based personalized normative feedback ( PFI ) B ) intervention group receive web-based self-help material ( SHM ) C ) control group receive nothing . After 6 12 month follow-up participant receive questionnaire question alcohol consumption ( internetbased paper ) .
